#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define se second
#define fi first


using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair < int, int > pii;
typedef pair < int , pii > tuple;
typedef list < int > vi;
const int MAX = 1e5+5;
const int INF = 1e9+9;


int main(){
	
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	
	int n,m;
	string a[1005];
	
	while( t-- ){
		cin >> n >> m;
		for( int i = 0 ; i < n ;i++ ) cin >> a[i];
		for( int i = 0 ; i < n ;i++ ){
			for( int j = 0 ; j < m;j++ ){
				cout << a[i][m-j-1];
			}
			cout << endl;
		}
			
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
